docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 3 -The United States prepared a strong statement today in response to Fidel Castro's call for $30,000,000,000 for a LatinAmerican development plan over the next ten years.

docs.abstract: US prepares reply to Castro; other demands made at conf for increased US aid discussed

docs.snippet: ANTIAGO, Chile, May 9 -- United States Ambassadors serving in ten South American republics reported today that an "intensified-effort" was being made by international communism to undermine the unity of the Western Hemisphere.
docs.lead_paragraph: ANTIAGO, Chile, May 9 -- United States Ambassadors serving in ten South American republics reported today that an "intensified-effort" was being made by international communism to undermine the unity of the Western Hemisphere.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 11 -- A revolt with the help of Cuban arms against the Paraguayan strong man, Gen. Alfredo Stroessner, was discussed here in February by Paraguayan exiles and representatives of Premier Fidel Castro.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 16 -President Artuvo Frondizi began today action to overcome the most serious Government crisis since he took office a year ago, with the reorganizing of his Cabinet along lines satisfactory to the armed forces.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 23 -- The full extent of the devastation wrought by what are described as the worst floods in South America this century is slowly emerging in Uruguay, Argentina and Brazil.
